trans-unit.source: Represents a control skin, which is a means to define stylistic properties that are applied to an ASP.NET Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 代表控制項的面板，也就是定義會套用到 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的樣式屬性的方法。

trans-unit.source: Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, ControlSkin, or <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes directly.
trans-unit.target: 不使用頁面和控制項的開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>，ControlSkin，或<xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme>類別直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>

trans-unit.source: These classes are used internally by the ASP.NET page framework to apply server-side properties and cascading style sheet definitions that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skin files to specific types of controls.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別會在內部使用由 ASP.NET 網頁架構適用於伺服器端的屬性和階層式樣式表定義 ASP.NET 主題和特定類型的控制項的控制項面板檔案中所定義。

trans-unit.source: ControlSkin objects represent a named skin or default skin of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> control at run time and design time.
trans-unit.target: ControlSkin 物件代表具名的外觀或預設外觀的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>控制項在執行的階段和設計階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET builds <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme>, ControlSkin and <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate> objects to apply the style elements defined in themes and control skin files to ASP.NET Web pages and controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 建置<xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme>，ControlSkin 和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>要套用佈景主題和 ASP.NET Web 網頁和控制項的控制面板檔案中定義的樣式項目物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme>

trans-unit.source: For more information about themes and control skins, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需佈景主題和面板控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref> class using the passed <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> type and delegate.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref>類別使用傳入<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>類型和委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to which the skin is applied, used to enforce type consistency among named skins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>面板套用的用來強制執行型別具名面板的一致性。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate"></xref> that applies the style elements defined in a control skin file to the type identified by the `controlType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate"> </xref>可套用至所識別的型別控制面板檔案中定義的樣式項目`controlType`參數。

trans-unit.source: Applies the skin to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> control contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 套用面板<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>所包含的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin> class to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, which applies the skin to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>物件相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>，這會套用到面板<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The control to which to apply the skin.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>的控制項， <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"> </xref>物件相關聯。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> used in this instance.
